API
===
Import MESA as::

    import mesa as ms

Multiomics
----------

.. module:: mesa.multiomics
.. currentmodule:: mesa

.. autosummary::
    :toctree: api

Ecospatial
----------

.. module:: mesa.ecospatial
.. currentmodule:: mesa

    :toctree: api

    ecospatial.generate_patches
    ecospatial.calculate_shannon_entropy
    ecospatial.calculate_diversity_index
